name: baramwe-astro-blog
description: Build a personal website, blog, or portfolio with Astro.

scripts.db:studio: wrangler d1 execute bl-house --local --command='SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type="table";'
scripts.db:reset: wrangler d1 execute bl-house --local --command='DROP TABLE IF EXISTS reservations; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS room_prices; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS rooms; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS room_types; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS hotels;'
scripts.db:hotels: wrangler d1 execute bl-house --local --command='SELECT * FROM hotels;'
scripts.db:rooms: wrangler d1 execute bl-house --local --command='SELECT rt.name as room_type, rt.base_price, rt.max_occupancy FROM room_types rt;'
scripts.db:prices: wrangler d1 execute bl-house --local --command='SELECT rt.name, rp.price_date, rp.price, rp.is_weekend FROM room_types rt JOIN room_prices rp ON rt.id = rp.room_type_id ORDER BY rp.price_date;'
scripts.db:reservations: wrangler d1 execute bl-house --local --command='SELECT reservation_code, guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date, status, total_amount FROM reservations ORDER BY created_at DESC;'
scripts.db:shell: echo 'D1 Shell 모드 - 직접 SQL 명령어를 입력하세요 (종료: .quit)' && sqlite3 $(find .wrangler -name '*.sqlite' | head -1)
